mapper.sql: operateType, module, operateUserId, operateBy, operateTime, content, filePath, pKey, remark, remark1, remark2, deleted
mapper.select: select id, from logs where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: update logs set operateType=#{operateType}, module=#{module}, operateUserId=#{operateUserId}, operateBy=#{operateBy}, operateTime=#{operateTime}, content=#{content}, filePath=#{filePath}, pKey=#{pKey}, remark=#{remark}, remark1=#{remark1}, remark2=#{remark2}, deleted=#{deleted} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update logs set deleted=2 where id=#{id}
